variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| fields ado.organization
| dedup ado.organization

0.title: üîÑ Number of completed builds
0.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.status == "finished"  and ado.organization == $Organisation 
| summarize countDistinct(cicd.pipeline.id)

1.title: ‚úÖ Successful builds
1.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| filter build.result == "succeeded"
| summarize successful_build = count()

3.title: Failed releases
3.query:
fetch events, from:now()-24h, to:now()
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| filter build.result != "succeeded"
| summarize failed_builds = count()

5.title: üöÄ  Most recent completed build version
5.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.status == "finished" and ado.organization == $Organisation 
| sort cicd.pipeline.id desc
| limit 1

11.title: ‚ùóÔ∏è Aborted builds
11.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| filter build.result == "aborted"
| summarize aborted_build = count()

33.title: Build trend over the 24-hours
33.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build" and build.result == "succeeded"

36.title: Failed tasks
36.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "failed"
| summarize failed_tasks = count()

37.title: Failed task over time
37.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "failed"
| makeTimeseries failed_tasks = count(), interval:5m

38.title: Failed task over time
38.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "succeeded"
| makeTimeseries succeeded_task = count(), interval:5m

39.title: Succeeded tasks
39.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "succeeded"
| summarize succeeded_tasks = count()

41.title: Failed task over time
41.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "aborted"
| makeTimeseries aborted_tasks = count(), interval:5m

42.title: Aborted tasks
42.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type == "Task"
| filter task.result == "aborted"
| summarize aborted_tasks = count()

43.title: Slowest 10 tasks
43.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type != "Stage"
| fieldsAdd duration_ms = toTimestamp(end_time) - toTimestamp(start_time)
| summarize avg_duration_ms = avg(duration_ms), by:{task.name}
| sort avg_duration_ms desc
| limit 10

44.title: Frequent 5 tasks
44.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| filter task.type != "Stage"
| summarize runs = count(), by:{task.name}
| sort runs desc
| limit 5

45.title: Successful build detail
45.query:
fetch events, from:now()-24h, to:now()
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| fields timestamp, build.number, build.result, vcs.branch.name, vcs.commit.id, build.webUrl, cicd.pipeline.id, cicd.pipeline.run.id
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 50

47.title: Event volume by Stage/Task/Job
47.query:
fetch events, from:now()-24h, to:now()
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "task"
| summarize records = count(), by:{task.type}
| sort records desc

48.title: Builds by branch
48.query:
fetch events, from:now()-24h, to:now()
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| summarize builds = count(), by:{vcs.branch.name}
| sort builds desc
| limit 20

50.title: Build outcome trend
50.query:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"
| filter event.provider == "azure-devops"
| filter ado.organization == $Organisation
| filter event.type == "build"
| makeTimeseries builds = count(), by:{build.result}, interval:5m
